meanings.definition: The simultaneous execution of two or more programs by a computer.
meanings.sent1: Multiprogramming helps computers run many programs together.
meanings.sent2: In multiprogramming, a computer can handle different tasks at once.
meanings.sent3: The computer was so good at multiprogramming, it could juggle tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: To the computer, multiprogramming is like spinning plates in the air.
meanings.sent5: The concept of multiprogramming is like a busy traffic intersection.

meanings.definition: A technique that allows multiple programs to run on a computer at the same time.
meanings.sent1: With multiprogramming, a computer can manage many programs simultaneously.
meanings.sent2: Multiprogramming enables efficient use of computer resources.
meanings.sent3: The computer magician amazed the audience by performing a multiprogramming trick.
meanings.sent4: In the world of computers, multiprogramming is the ultimate multitasking skill.
meanings.sent5: The seamless operation of multiprogramming is like a well-choreographed dance.
